Body:
"""Test get_extended_compound_info_list returns info for a list of record IDs."""
info = cs.get_details_batch([6543, 1235, 6084])
assert len(info) == 3
assert all(field in info[0] for field in ['id', 'smiles', 'formula',
    'averageMass', 'molecularWeight', 'monoisotopicMass', 'nominalMass',
    'commonName', 'referenceCount', 'dataSourceCount', 'pubMedCount',
    'rscCount', 'mol2D'])
assert all(isinstance(info[0][field], float) for field in ['averageMass',
    'molecularWeight', 'monoisotopicMass'])
assert isinstance(info[0]['id'], int)
assert all(isinstance(info[0][field], six.text_type) for field in ['smiles',
    'formula', 'commonName', 'mol2D'])
